title: How to score maximum marks in the grammar section with the help of a mirror of common errors? With chapter-wise exercises, do we have to do all previous papers also given in the end - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me help you. Here are some rules to follow: Learn all rules by heart : I clubbed some chapters and made them one topic so that it will become easy for me to remember rules. For example I have clubbed Noun, subject verb agreement as one topic.Practice Exercises provided at the end of each chapter once you finish going through the rules.Start practising the sets given in the book.Analyse your mistake after each set & don't checkbyour answer after each question.Previoua year questions are must to solve because they will let you know the level of your preparation besides you will gradually aget confident while solving them.Thank you For queries, you can join the group on Quora by clicking on this link.
